oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notebook. Includes some words and sentences. Mostly personal history (genealogies, and places of of contributors and their relations). Customs, especially burial practises. A segment of a diary of DB. Contributions taken from conversations with people at Stuurman's pits, Eyerdoppan etc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek
Book BC151_A3_004
